title: "The Steelers Are Better Off Without AB"
description: Hot Takedown is back! This week, we tackle Antonio Brown's trade to the Raiders, the Mets going for it in the NL East and our Rabbit Hole of the week.
itunes:title: "The Steelers Are Better Off Without AB"
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
